bug.summary: MORPH_HITMISS still missed hehavior with all zero kernels

cv2_x = np.array([ [0, 255, 0], [0, 255, 0], [0, 255, 0], ], dtype=np.uint8) result = cv2.morphologyEx(cv2_x, cv2.MORPH_HITMISS, cv2_kernel) The result: [[0 0 0] [0 0 0] [0 0 0]] instead of: [[0 0 0] [0 255 0] [0 0 0]] <denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
